title: Adequate domestic liquidity reduces refinancing risk for Asia-Pac NBFIs: Fitch
byline: Expects rated NBFIs in China, India, Indonesia, Thailand and Sri Lanka to benefit from easing monetary measures

title: Sri Lanka revives LNG terminal tender, to run from 2028 : Minister
byline: This process is now underway and the LNG supply is planned to start in 2028

title: Sri Lanka's first listed Sukuk oversubscribed
byline: The Sukuk was issued by Vidullanka Plc, a renewable energy firm

title: Sri Lanka EDB, ADB discuss National Export Development Plan for 2025-2029
byline: NEDP expected to serve as a comprehensive framework to guide Sri Lanka’s export-led economic transformation

title: Sri Lanka rice, coconut, fish, and rubber production decline, tea increases in April: CB
byline: According to the central bank’s Agriculture Sector Data Bulletin for May 2025

title: Sri Lanka opposition seeks parliamentary debate on Iran-Israel war's economic impact
byline: "This is a matter of national importance," Sajith Premadasa said.

title: Sri Lanka rupee opens stronger, bond yields flat
byline: An auction of Rs. 132,000 million Treasury bills was ongoing.

title: Sri Lanka's Bank of Ceylon increases paid-up capital by Rs730mn
byline: Increased from Rs. 25,000 million to Rs. 25,730 million through extraordinary gazette
